Chicago, IL - Full Time. Eventric is looking for a PHP developer with UI/UX experience. A-level ping pong skills will also be necessary to avoid humiliation. We provide software solutions for music touring professionals and work with many of the biggest names in the music industry.

We're located in the Wicker Park neighborhood of Chicago, just off the blue line Damen stop. Great neighborhood with great restaurants all around. We have a small team, flexible schedule, music and ping pong in the office. Access to concert tickets and opportunities to hang out back stage with tour managers to help them use the software and gather requirements.

Send a message to support@eventric.com ATTN Jason.
